name: PUnit.gcd_eq
initialProofState:
x y : PUnit.{u_1 + 1}
⊢ Eq (GCDMonoid.gcd x y) PUnit.unit
decl:
@[simp]
theorem gcd_eq {x y : PUnit} : gcd x y = unit :=
  rfl

name: PUnit.lcm_eq
initialProofState:
x y : PUnit.{u_1 + 1}
⊢ Eq (GCDMonoid.lcm x y) PUnit.unit
decl:
@[simp]
theorem lcm_eq {x y : PUnit} : lcm x y = unit :=
  rfl

name: PUnit.norm_unit_eq
decl:
@[simp]
theorem norm_unit_eq {x : PUnit} : normUnit x = 1 :=
  rfl
